backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing shipments with CRUD-like functions for adding shipments and events and querying details or all shipments.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata listing implemented frontend entry‑point behaviors, affected files, components, and associated requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files and components across the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark mode with global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the root element and loading the custom React entry module entry.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React app root configuring TanStack Router routes and wrapping them with a ThemeProvider and shared layout.
frontend/src/components/ContactDetailsCa: Component rendering contact information and business hours using card UI elements and icons.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Responsive navigation header with logo, route links, theme‑aware branding, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCategoryS: Reusable section component rendering a category title, icon, and a grid of service cards with descriptions.
frontend/src/components/ServicePreviewGr: Grid of four highlighted freight service previews with icons, titles, and short descriptions.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with company info, navigation links, services list, and contact details.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Defines the main layout wrapping pages with a header, content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/StatsStrip.tsx: Displays a row of logistics-related statistics with icons and values.
frontend/src/entry.tsx: Initializes the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context and handles login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating no dynamic backend queries are used.
frontend/src/hooks/useShipmentTracking.t: Fetches shipment details from the backend actor based on a tracking number.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables, themes, and base typography styles.
frontend/src/lib/contactValidation.ts: Validates contact form fields and returns structured error messages.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into human-readable date strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstrap file that mounts the app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with company story, values, stats, and imagery.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact form page with validation, submission simulation, and a details panel, showing success or errors depending on form state.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with a hero section, service highlights, stats, and navigation links to services and contact pages.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays categorized freight services with icons and descriptions using a reusable category section component.
frontend/src/pages/TrackingPage.tsx: Shipment tracking page with a disabled input and button, showing a 'Coming Soon' alert for the unimplemented tracking feature.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and container settings with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing project state, requirements, architectural notes, and known issues for the freight website.
